attributes.additional_details: HS1 Is also Proof, that nobody has the money to use such expensive travel to save 30-60 Minutes of time..  Use the 33-90 Billion to improve existing Travel Networks.. And save peoples lives, Heritage, And natural historic green belts..
attributes.background: The Northern Relief road is proof nobody will use this expensive service.  The Northern Relief road is Empty Daily, While the M6 Motorway traffic jams has never changed.
